alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 15 at 7:00PM MST until March 15 at 9:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall and runoff continues. * WHERE...A portion of northwest Arizona, including the following county, Mohave. * WHEN...Until 915 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 658 PM MST, gauge reports indicated heavy rain. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Beaver Dam Wash, Big Bend Wash, Virgin River and Castle Cliff Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Beaver Dam and Littlefield. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
